snippet.title: Being torn apart by time and space, Spacetime Elapse - Youga! / Torchlight: Infinite New Hero Trait
snippet.description:
■ Spacetime Elapse Youga
Key Words: DoT / Reaping / Affliction

A long time ago, alchemists used the Clockwork Core to tear through space and time, creating a turbulent region where alchemists from many parallel universes were torn apart and reconstructed.
This was how the bandaged Youga came to be!
What is underneath the bandages? Could this be like Schrödinger's cat?

- Spacetime Elapse - Youga can create a Twisted Spacetime that reduces the movement speed of enemies within it and deals additional DoT damage to them.
- The Twisted Spacetime will record the DoT damage Youga deals to enemies and unleashes this damage on the foes after it moves.
- After learning Spacetime Cutting, Twisted Spacetime can even reap the DoT damage dealt to enemies!

Don't forget to exchange Hero Emblems for Youga's Spacetime Elapse trait in the Hero Shop!
